I wrote a JUnit test where I used java.util.logging.Logger to put some 
inf=
ormation in a file. If I start that JUnit test with Eclipse or on 
the cons=
ole with java TheJunitTest all works fine and the log will 
created. 
But i=
f I start that JUnit test within an ant build.xml no log from my 
logger is=
 created. 

And I don't know why. Any suggestions?
